page.title: 02Summer Half Term
page.content: On Saturday morning I awoke early,as I was going riding with Melanie on her pony,Toby.I got out my old clothes and had my breakfast.After I had washed and cleaned my teeth,I set off on my bike.When I arrived Melanie was waiting with Toby.I had first ride, which I thoroughly enjoyed.When it was time for dinner,I went home for a meal and collected my swimming things as I was going to Coastfields Pool.There I played on the slide and ducks.I was so brave and jumped off the diving board which was at the deep end,but I was really quite safe as I could swim 75 metres.After a bit of playing about in the water I went home for tea and got changed.I went out with my Mum and Dad to the Three Tuns Pub.I had a bag of crisps and a drink of Coke.On the way home we bought some chips and then went to bed.
